thread.title: AkzoNobel wins Responsible Care Award for product stewardship (Akzo Nobel NV)
thread.title_full: AkzoNobel wins Responsible Care Award for product stewardship (Akzo Nobel NV) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: AkzoNobel wins Responsible Care Award for product stewardship (Akzo Nobel NV)
text: ( Source : Akzo Nobel NV ) AkzoNobel's work in the area of product stewardship has been recognized with the 2015 European Responsible Care Award from the European Chemicals Industry Association ( CEFIC ). Due to be presented today in Brussels ,
